title: Joe's Men's Brixton Non-Denim Straight and Narrow Leg Twill Pant
description: The Brixton Twill in Abbey Stone is our best-selling straight and narrow fit that's ideal for everyday wear thanks to the 3x1 twill fabric that's exceptionally soft and super comfortable with just enough stretch
This five-pocket pair will become your year-round go-to when you want a break from denim
The Brixton Twill is our best-selling straight and narrow fit that's ideal for everyday wear thanks to the 3x1 twill fabric that's exceptionally soft and super comfortable with just enough stretch.
